sqlMap.sql:
SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , SUB1.LIC_GRP_ID , SUB1.PRJ_GRP_ID , SUB1.PRJ_ID , SUB1.PRJ_NM , SUB1.JEN_ID , SUB1.JEN_NM , SUB1.JEN_URL , SUB1.JEN_USR_ID , SUB1.JEN_USR_NM , SUB1.JEN_DESC , SUB1.JOB_ID , SUB1.JOB_TYPE_CD , SUB1.JOB_TYPE_NM , SUB1.JOB_RESTORE_ID , SUB1.JOB_PARAMETER , SUB1.JOB_DESC , SUB1.USE_CD , SUB1.USE_NM , SUB1.REG_DTM , SUB1.REG_USR_ID , SUB1.REG_USR_IP , SUB1.MODIFY_DTM , SUB1.MODIFY_USR_ID , SUB1.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , (SELECT PRJ_NM FROM PRJ1000 X WHERE X.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND X.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID) AS PRJ_NM , A.JEN_ID , C.JEN_NM , C.JEN_URL , C.JEN_USR_ID , (SELECT USR_NM FROM STM3000 X WHERE X.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND X.USR_ID = C.JEN_USR_ID) AS JEN_USR_NM , C.JEN_DESC , B.JOB_ID , B.JOB_TYPE_CD , (SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM STM4001 X WHERE X.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND X.MST_CD = 'DPL00002' AND X.SUB_CD = B.JOB_TYPE_CD) AS JOB_TYPE_NM , B.JOB_RESTORE_ID , B.JOB_PARAMETER , B.JOB_DESC , B.USE_CD , (SELECT SUB_CD_NM FROM STM4001 X WHERE X.LIC_GRP_ID = A.LIC_GRP_ID AND X.MST_CD = 'CMM00001' AND X.SUB_CD = B.USE_CD) AS USE_NM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM STM9002 A LEFT JOIN STM9001 B ON (A.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID AND A.JOB_ID = B.JOB_ID) LEFT JOIN STM9000 C ON (B.LIC_GRP_ID = C.LIC_GRP_ID AND B.JEN_ID = C.JEN_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND C.DEL_CD = '02' ) SUB1 WHERE 1=1
AND SUB1.PRJ_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_URL LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_DESC LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_USR_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JEN_USR_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_RESTORE_ID LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_DESC LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND SUB1.JOB_TYPE_CD = #searchTargetData#
AND SUB1.USE_CD = #searchTargetData#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
ASC
DESC
ORDER BY PRJ_NM ASC, JOB_ID ASC
sqlMap.select:
SELECT Z.* FROM (
) Z WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM (
) Z
